DTS ID:  100 x Grid_Nb (1-8) + 10 x DTS_Line + DTS_Local_Nb    (DTS ordering along the line)
POS   : 1000 x Grid_Nb (1-8) + 10 x Kapton (0-16) + Slot (0-8) (defines GEO position of DTS)
